response.overview: Scooper DanielRPK reports that a sequel to last year’s Glen Powell and Daisy Edgar Jones-led “Twisters” is in the works. The first film, a spiritual successor to 1996’s “Twister,” grossed $372 million worldwide. As the project is so early in development, there’s no word yet regarding returning stars or if Lee Isaac Chung will return to direct. [Source: GVN]  https://www.darkhorizons.com/quick-news-final-twisters-2-kosinski-friday/
response.title: Untitled Twisters Sequel
